content.title: COL3A1 Mutations in Vascular EDS
content.description: Molecular genetics of type III collagen mutations causing vascular Ehlers-Danlos syndrome

key_concepts.details: COL3A1 gene located on chromosome 2q32.2 encoding type III collagen
Glycine substitutions in triple helix domain most common; also splicing mutations and null alleles
Glycine substitutions generally cause more severe phenotype than haploinsufficiency variants
Sequence analysis of COL3A1; consider deletion/duplication analysis if sequencing negative
